meanings.definition: A yellow pigment obtained from the resin of trees native to Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: The artist used gamboge to paint the sun in the picture.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a beautiful gamboge color that stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel dipped its tail in gamboge and left a trail of yellow footprints.
meanings.sent4: The fields glowed with a gamboge hue as the sun began to set.
meanings.sent5: The children collected gamboge leaves to create vibrant artwork.

meanings.definition: A bright yellow color resembling that of gamboge pigment.
meanings.sent1: The walls of the room were painted in a cheerful gamboge shade.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden bloomed in various shades, including gamboge.
meanings.sent3: The gamboge balloons at the party added a festive touch to the decorations.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, as bright as gamboge.
meanings.sent5: The gamboge sunset painted the sky in a breathtaking display.
